login.title: Login
login.register_desc: If you're new to the site, please fill out the registration form.
login.register_features: Registered users get access to their order history, personalized offers, and discounts.
login.oauth_desc: You can log in if you're registered with one of these services:

register.name: First Name
register.field_for_legal_entity: This field is intended for legal entities.
register.accept_agreement: I agree to the processing of personal data and to receive newsletters
register.legal_entity_email: Enter the email address of the legal entity.
register.confirm_captcha_before_submit: Please confirm CAPTCHA before submitting the form.

registration_desc: After registering on the site, you will have access to order tracking, a personal account, and other new features.
